alert.note: Alert for Becker; Mahnomen; Norman; Pennington; Polk; Red Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 29 at 6:19AM CDT until May 29 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Red Lake County in northwestern Minnesota... Eastern Norman County in northwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Polk County in northwestern Minnesota... Western Mahnomen County in northwestern Minnesota... Northwestern Becker County in northwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Pennington County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 618 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Maple Bay to Dale, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Maple Bay around 620 AM CDT. Mentor around 625 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Flom, Brooks, Waubun and Faith. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Becker; Mahnomen; Norman; Pennington; Polk; Red Lake
